text:
Truthfully, i wasn't much of a fan of coconut before I stopped here. The coconut here was super fresh, subtly sweet, and refreshing from the hot weather. So nice.
It cost 5SGD, so a little pricey, but they also have sodas.

Also protection from the rain.

This is an essential stop to top up water. Owner sells mineral water, 100 plus, coconut water or even beer. It’s a little pricey but no choice. Nice small sitting area to chill with mangrove view behind.
This place was a lifesaver when I needed to cool down after the hikes and cycling. The fresh coconut was cool and refreshing. Yum!

Cool drinks and delicious coconuts, aunties even built their own overwater toilet 🤩 price completely justified considering that auntie has to transport all the drinks + ice to the stall HERSELF in the middle of nowhere 😤😤😤 love auntie and ah ma 新年快乐🎊
Small little drink store that let's you "travel back in time" nice ambience with the sound of Great outdoors. Coconut is a must have when you visit. Cute doggos to keep you company too!
